seo.description: Ceyhun Efe Kayan is a software engineer and entrepreneur.

about.title: About me
about.content:
I'm Ceyhun, a Machine Learning Engineer who's passionate about enhancing AI reasoning capabilities by integrating fundamental science concepts.

My research experience spans multi-omics data integration for predicting targeted treatment responses and modeling drug-induced proteome dynamics.

areas.title: Foundation on Intelligence Reasoning
areas.description: I'm passionate about enhancing AI reasoning capabilities by integrating fundamental scientific principles. My interests include developing models that can leverage domain knowledge to analyze and discover from the environment.

areas.title: ML for Presicion Oncology
areas.description: My applied research focuses on developing ML approaches for precision oncology. At Drexel University, I've collaborated with researchers from MD Anderson Cancer Center to design ML frameworks that integrate multi-omics data for predicting responses to targeted cancer therapies. My experience includes data preprocessing and feature engineering for complex datasets and designing ML model architectures.

journalPapers.text: Kayan, C. E., Yuksel Aldogan, K., & Gumus, A. (2023). "Intensity and phase stacked analysis of a Phase-OTDR system using deep transfer learning and recurrent neural networks", Applied Optics, 62(7), 1753-1764.

Duzyel, O., Catal, M., Kayan, C. E., Sevinc, A., & Gumus, A. (2023). "Adaptive resizer-based transfer learning framework for the diagnosis of breast cancer using histopathology images", Signal, Image and Video Processing, 17-10:1.

preprints.text: Kayan, C. E., Koksal, T. E., Sevinc, A., & Gumus, A. (2023). "Deep reproductive feature generation framework for the diagnosis of covid-19 and viral pneumonia using chest x-ray images", Arxiv.
